description.zh-CN: Claymorphism 是 3D 黏土质感设计风格，适合创意设计、插画风格和儿童产品。通过多层内外阴影、柔和的色彩渐变和圆润的造型，创造如同真实黏土般的立体触感和柔软质地，营造温暖、友好、富有触感的氛围。
description.en-US: Claymorphism is a 3D clay texture design style, suitable for creative design, illustration style, and children's products. Through multi-layer inner and outer shadows, soft color gradients, and rounded shapes, it creates realistic clay-like tactile feel and soft texture, delivering warm, friendly, and tangible atmosphere.
